Spider03.synopsis: Followup with spiders after they kill their sister Xanta.
Spider03.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -623.809; 1.504; 363.4. Talk with Lur Otan (with and without PETPAL ta)

Spider02.synopsis: Followup after the spiders have killed their sister Xanta for being disloyal.
Spider02.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -623.979; 1.504; 361.4. Talk with Lur Jox (with and without PETPAL tag)

Spider04.synopsis: Followup dialogue with spider after they attack and kill Lur Xanta
Spider04.how_to_trigger: Repro Steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -624.86; 1.504; 362.84. Talk with Lur Fu (with and without PETPAL)

FourWay.synopsis: In this dialogue, Lur Xanta is trying to convince the other 3 to leave with her to join the cult of Lolth.Player can help her convince them, or fail to do so and they will attack Lur Xanta for being disloyal.This dialogue has 2 outcomes:AGGRO: Lur Jox (or another spider) attacks Lur Xanta, killing her in one shot. (via gameplay - not cine)PEACEFUL: Lur Xanta convinces the other 3 to follow her into the Underdark-- they are leaving to somewhere new.Lur Xanta is fantatical and somewhat learned. The other 3 are a bit more simple.
FourWay.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. loadlevel WLD_Main_A2. goto -621.967; 1.504; 362.33. Talk to any of the spiders.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The 'FourWay' session is a branching dialogue where Lur Xanta either persuades her spider siblings to join her into the Underdark (peaceful outcome) or, if she fails, triggers an aggressive outcome in which one of the spiders (such as Lur Jox) attacks and kills her. The three Spider sessions (Spider02, Spider03, and Spider04) are described as follow‐up dialogues that occur only after Xanta has been killed. Thus, if the aggressive outcome of FourWay occurs, it must happen before any of the Spider sessions. In contrast, if the peaceful outcome is chosen, then Xanta survives and the follow‐up Spider sessions do not occur. Therefore, the peaceful branch of FourWay and the follow–up Spider sessions are mutually exclusive (a given playthrough cannot have both outcomes).

Spider03_1.speaker: Lur Otan
Spider03_1.text: Lur Otan. Lur Fu. Lur Jox. Father Murmath. That is all.

Spider03_2.speaker: Lur Otan
Spider03_2.text: We are Clan Lur. Xanta is not.

Spider02_1.speaker: Lur Jox
Spider02_1.text: You heard her. Xanta was a betrayer. We will miss her. But she was wrong.

Spider02_2.speaker: Lur Jox
Spider02_2.text: Watch yourself. We defend Father Murmath. At all costs.

Spider04_0.speaker: Lur Fu
Spider04_0.context: NodeContext: Quickly, rhythmically, like a chant

Spider04_1.speaker: Lur Fu
Spider04_1.text: Father Murmath. Father Murmath. Father Murmath.

Spider04_2.speaker: Lur Fu
Spider04_2.text: No Spider Queen. No Spider Queen. Father Murmath.
Spider04_2.context: NodeContext: Quickly, rhythmically, like a chant

FourWay_119.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_119.text: I speak true, brothers! You know it in your hearts! You know it in your very souls!

FourWay_53.speaker: Lur Jox
FourWay_53.text: We need no 'Lolth' - no spider queen! Father Murmath is the head of clan Lur. He hatched us, raised us, feeds us!

FourWay_46.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_46.text: What care we for his business here? He keeps us small. Keeps us contained. We should be with the Spider Queen - revered, adored!

FourWay_136.speaker: Player
FourWay_136.text: Your sister speaks true. The Spider Queen would welcome you with great enthusiasm.

FourWay_94.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_94.text: You! Please - explain to my brothers - we must be among our own kind!

FourWay_26.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_26.text: *These spiders are loyal to the local duergar. In the event of a fight, they will join the fray against you - with slavering enthusiasm.*

FourWay_56.speaker: Player
FourWay_56.text: I'd rather not get involved in your little coup.

FourWay_0.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_0.text: It is no coup - it is the opportunity of our entire lives!

FourWay_52.speaker: Lur Jox
FourWay_52.text: Fie! Xanta - even the Spider Queen's faithful wants no part in your game!

FourWay_77.speaker: Player
FourWay_77.text: I suppose the Order of the Soul Spiders would have room for you among their ranks.

FourWay_129.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_129.text: I've heard the very same! Come, brothers - follow me into her hairy embrace!

FourWay_34.speaker: Lur Jox
FourWay_34.text: We need no 'Order' - Father Murmath is the way!

FourWay_102.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_102.text: Fools! Don't you see - the time of Murmath has passed! The Spider Queen awaits us!

FourWay_86.speaker: Player
FourWay_86.text: The Spider Queen doesn't suffer hesitation. I fear for anyone who resists her call.

FourWay_8.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_8.text: The time for planning is over! Follow me, brothers - into her hairy embrace!

FourWay_169.speaker: Lur Otan
FourWay_169.text: He is all he is and all he is not!

FourWay_71.speaker: Player
FourWay_71.text: THE PRIEST IS WEAK. BECOME STRONG.

FourWay_99.speaker: Player
FourWay_99.text: Among the Spider Queen's followers, you'd be revered as her physical manifestation. Honoured. Exalted.

FourWay_35.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_35.text: All three! Follow me, brothers - we will find our due among the Spider Queen's dedicants. We deserve as much!

FourWay_1.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_1.text: In the name of the Spider Queen - we fly!

FourWay_50.speaker: Lur Jox
FourWay_50.text: We owe Father Murmath all we are - and we will never betray him!

FourWay_64.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_64.text: But - but the Spider Queen! Lolth! Our due!

FourWay_78.speaker: Player
FourWay_78.text: You owe nothing to Murmath. Break your bonds, free yourselves. Become unstoppable.

FourWay_108.speaker: Player
FourWay_108.text: Recall your learnings about the Spider Queen, Lolth.

FourWay_137.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_137.text: *You've read that harming spiders is illegal among Lolth's faithful - and often punishable by death.*

FourWay_168.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_168.text: Father Murmath is our past - Lolth is our future!

FourWay_81.speaker: Player
FourWay_81.text: Turning on your head-of-clan, are you? I'm sure that'll end well.

FourWay_116.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_116.text: We do not turn on Father Murmath. But we do outgrow him. The fate of clan Lur lies with the Spider Queen!

FourWay_55.speaker: Player
FourWay_55.text: You should know that spiders are revered among Lolth's faithful. Harming one of your kind is a capital crime.

FourWay_10.speaker: Player
FourWay_10.text: Murmath? Is that the guy who keeps telling everyone about his useless, hideous spiders?

FourWay_83.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_83.text: He... he might've! He doesn't know our true potential - our true splendour! Only Lolth knows that.

FourWay_123.speaker: Player
FourWay_123.text: I don't care where you go, but it's time for all of you to leave.

FourWay_142.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_142.text: You see?! Such disrespect! Such disdain! And does Father Murmath raise a whisper in our defence? With the Spider Queen's protection, we would never suffer such indignity again!

FourWay_103.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_103.text: You see? Father Murmath's time has passed. Come, brothers - follow me into Lolth's hairy embrace!

FourWay_93.speaker: Lur Jox
FourWay_93.text: We will not betray Father Murmath. We will never leave him!

FourWay_37.speaker: Player
FourWay_37.text: I think your sister is right - among the Spider Queen's worshippers, you'll reach your true potential.

FourWay_36.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_36.text: This and so much more. In Lolth's hairy embrace, all is possible.

FourWay_39.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_39.text: HAHA! Yes! Now, brothers - our new dawn awaits!

FourWay_124.speaker: Player
FourWay_124.text: Spiders for the Spider Queen. Seems logical.

FourWay_62.speaker: Lur Xanta
FourWay_62.text: But it goes beyond logic. Do not you feel it, brothers? The pull for something more? Do you not see it, friend visitor? Their unfulfilled potential?

FourWay_68.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_68.text: *You don't sense much unfulfilled potential, but one thing is certain: this crew won't hesitate to sink their fangs into your belly if their duergar master gives the word.*

FourWay_16.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_16.text: *You sense very little from the shifting trio.*

FourWay_61.speaker: Player
FourWay_61.text: See how this mutiny plays out.

FourWay_161.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_161.text: *These spiders aren't wild - they've been raised by local duergar and are fiercely loyal to them.*

FourWay_90.speaker: Player
FourWay_90.text: Try to discern the nature of their chatter.

FourWay_100.speaker: Narrator
FourWay_100.text: *They appear to be in conflict - the larger spider versus the other three.*

FourWay_12.speaker: Player
FourWay_12.text: Hey! Knock it off, the lot of you!

FourWay_114.speaker: Player
FourWay_114.text: Stand back and see how things play out.
